snippet: With their votes due this weekend, Bradley's Geno Ford had an easy solution for how Missouri Valley coaches and media should decide the conference's player of the year this season....

headline.print_headline: How Dominant Are Shockers? Ask MVC Coaches
headline.main: How Dominant Are Shockers? Ask MVC Coaches

lead_paragraph: With their votes due this weekend, Bradley's Geno Ford had an easy solution for how Missouri Valley coaches and media should decide the conference's player of the year this season.
